byline.contributor: Steve Wembi contributed reporting from Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of Congo.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Several analysts said that footage from a battlefield video revealed government-sponsored killings of civilians and that the video could be used as evidence of war crimes.
snippet: Several analysts said that footage from a battlefield video revealed government-sponsored killings of civilians and that the video could be used as evidence of war crimes....

headline.main: ‘Look, They Are Dying’: Video Appears to Show Massacre by Congolese Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Film Appears to Reveal Mass Killing in Congo
